content: jjuunniimmoo ssttaarrddeeww vvaalllleeyy kknniitt ffllaatt sseeaammeedd stitches used in this pattern none of the tutorials linked are mine cast on link to tutorial k knit link to tutorial p purl link to tutorial kfb knit front and back left leaning increase link to tutorial m1 make 1 right leaning increase link to tutorial ssk slip slip knit left leaning decrease link to tutorial k2t knit 2 together right leaning decrease link to tutorial drawstring cast off method of casting off link to tutorial * instruction * - repeat instruction instruction number do the instruction the specified number of times only needed for this pattern base colour dk yarn this pattern will use green yarn black yarn arms legs eyes antennae/head stem stuffing sewing/darning needle and/or a crochet hook if you re using a flat slip_stitch seam for this pattern i used 3 75mm needles and dk yarn height of project - 18cm width of project - 11cm gauge 10cm x 10cm = 30 stitches x 37 row main body base colour yarn make 2 row instruction additional comment number cast on 16 stitches 1 *p* 2 k2 kfb kfb k9 2 increases at the start of the row 2 increases at the end of the row 20 stitches original credit cryptious on ravelry and ko-fi please don t republish elsewhere without my consent if found elsewhere this content should be free of charge m1 k1 m1 k2 3 *p* 4 k2 kfb k13 m1 k2 1 increase at the start of the row 1 increase at the end of the row 22 stitches 5 *p* 6 k2 kfb kfb k15 2 increases at the start of the row 2 increases at the end of the row 26 stitches m1 k1 m1 k2 7 *p* 8 k2 kfb k21 m1 k2 1 increase at the start of the row 1 increase at the end of the row 28 stitches 9 *p* 10 k2 kfb k23 m1 1 increase at the start of the row 1 increase at the end of the row 30 stitches k2 11 *p* 12 *k* 13 *p* 14 k2 kfb k25 m1 1 increase at the start of the row 1 increase at the end of the row 32 stitches k2 15 *p* 16 *k* 17 *p* 18 *k* 19 *p* 20 *k* 21 *p* 22 *k* 23 *p* 24 *k* 25 *p* 26 *k* 27 *p* 28 k2 ssk k24 k2t 1 decrease at the start of the row 1 decrease at the end of the row 30 stitches k2 29 *p* 30 k2 ssk ssk k18 2 decreases at the start of the row 2 decreases at the end of the row 26 stitches original credit cryptious on ravelry and ko-fi please don t republish elsewhere without my consent if found elsewhere this content should be free of charge k2t k2t k2 31 *p* 32 k2 ssk ssk k14 2 decreases at the start of the row 2 decreases at the end of the row
